resource.html:
We want to get you into the flow of development. No UI distractions, hands on the keyboard, moving quickly and efficiently through your work.

Some times you need to work with files and directories. How can you stay in the flow when navigating your files?

This series of tips shows the Navigation Bar: activate it on demand, cursor and speed type your way through listings, and do your operation.

frontmatter.title: Navigation Bar Intro
frontmatter.subtitle: Move around files with keyboard, without wasting screen UI space
frontmatter.label: A
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Auto-Run Tests
frontmatter.subtitle: Get into testing mode by telling PyCharm to automatically re-run tests as you type.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Add Line After/Before
frontmatter.subtitle: Smart-add a line, from the middle of a line, after or before the current line.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Better Autocomplete Results in Angular Templates
frontmatter.subtitle: Narrow the universe of Angular template completions to those that matter.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Conditional Breakpoints
frontmatter.subtitle: Speed up your debugging by stopping execution only when you want to.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Navigate Cursor Position Back and Forth
frontmatter.subtitle: Easily navigate back to where you were, or where you went.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Managing Copyright Policy
frontmatter.subtitle: Use the copyright tool to manage a copyright statement across project files.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Adding Fields In a Constructor
frontmatter.subtitle: Let your IDE add constructor arguments to your instance.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Create SQLite Database Connection By Drag-and-Drop
frontmatter.subtitle: Drag-and-drop a .sqlite database file onto the Database tool to create a connection.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Create a Project from GitHub
frontmatter.subtitle: Let PyCharm do the work to clone and setup a project hosted on GitHub.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Enable vim keybindings with IdeaVim plugin
frontmatter.subtitle: Use the same keybindings from vim with a PlugIn
frontmatter.author: wht

frontmatter.title: Disable Tabs
frontmatter.subtitle: Save space and stay keyboard-centric by turning off the tabs.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Evaluate Expression During Debugging
frontmatter.subtitle: Select your code and execute it, in the right context.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Parsed f-string expressions
frontmatter.subtitle: Bracket completion and syntax highlighting for f-string evaluated expressions.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Find Action
frontmatter.subtitle: Skip memorizing keyboard shortcuts and speed search for actions instead.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Generate Imports While Typing
frontmatter.subtitle: Avoid interruption by letting PyCharm generate your imports as you type.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Install and import
frontmatter.subtitle: While typing a symbol, let PyCharm install it and generate the import.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Use Recent Files to Open Tool Window
frontmatter.subtitle: From the Recent Files popup, open one of the IDE tool windows.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: LiveEdit HTML and CSS
frontmatter.subtitle: With the LiveEdit plugin, open HTML and CSS in Chrome, over HTTP, and see updates as you save.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Use Local History to Avoid Disaster
frontmatter.subtitle: Use the IDE's built-in history facility to recover changes when VCS can't help you.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Make and Extend Selection Using Keyboard
frontmatter.subtitle: Use the keyboard to select blocks of code then extend/shrink the selection.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Move Block Up/Down Using Keyboard
frontmatter.subtitle: Use the keyboard to move a line or selection up or down in your file.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Activate Navigation Bar
frontmatter.subtitle: Bring up the Navigation Bar as needed, let it disappear when finished.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Create New File With Navigation Bar
frontmatter.subtitle: Activate the Navigation Bar and create a new file somewhere in the project tree.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Find In Path With Navigation Bar
frontmatter.subtitle: Use keyboard and Navigation Bar to find files under a path.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Navigate Files With Navigation Bar
frontmatter.subtitle: Move around your project tree and select files, from your keyboard, with the Navigation Bar.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Open File With Navigation Bar
frontmatter.subtitle: Open a file somewhere in the project tree using the keyboard and Navigation Bar.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Narrow Navigation Bar With Speed Search
frontmatter.subtitle: Narrow and select from a long folder listing Navigation Bar by typing a speed search.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Navigate to File
frontmatter.subtitle: Jump to a file without using the Project Tool and your mouse.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Navigate to Symbol
frontmatter.subtitle: Navigate your project by code, not files.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: One Import Per Line Preference
frontmatter.subtitle: Tell PyCharm to put each import on a separate line when it cleans up your imports.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Optimize Imports
frontmatter.subtitle: Automate the organizing and cleaning up of your Python imports with Optimize Imports.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: View Parameter Info
frontmatter.subtitle: Quickly see function arguments and argument types.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Only Commit Some Changes
frontmatter.subtitle: Unselect files or changed regions within files during the commit process.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Put New Project Under Version Control
frontmatter.subtitle: The fastest way to register a new project directory under local version control.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Quick Documentation
frontmatter.subtitle: View arguments and documentation without interrupting your flow.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Jump to Recent File
frontmatter.subtitle: Use Recent Files to quickly jump to last-visited file.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Reduce Clutter by Disabling Tools
frontmatter.subtitle: Save space by turning off various toolbars and Project Tool.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Rename a File and Its References
frontmatter.subtitle: Change your mind on a file name and the IDE makes all the changes for you.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Reformat Code
frontmatter.subtitle: Tell PyCharm to clean up indentation and other code style in your file.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Reword Commit Message
frontmatter.subtitle: Change the wording in your last commit message, after you committed.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Rename Symbol
frontmatter.subtitle: Change a variable name, class name, or other symbol, across the project.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Run From Keyboard
frontmatter.subtitle: Use the keyboard to select and run a run configuration.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Run npm Scripts from package.json
frontmatter.subtitle: Browse your package.json scripts and run in a dedicated tool window.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: See VCS Changed Lines In Gutter
frontmatter.subtitle: Quickly spot which parts of your file have changed since the last commit.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Run Single Test
frontmatter.subtitle: Speed up testing by focusing on one test.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Speed Up Coverage with Configuration File
frontmatter.subtitle: Speed up your "visual coverage" with a config file and correct working directory.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Split Screen Without Tabs
frontmatter.subtitle: Get your code and tests side-by-side without resorting to tabs.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Spot Coverage Gaps Using the Gutter
frontmatter.subtitle: Let the IDE help you spot coverage gaps in your testing.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Wrap Selection With Tag
frontmatter.subtitle: Use the keyboard to put a wrapper tag around a selection of code.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt

frontmatter.title: Undo Last Commit
frontmatter.subtitle: Easily and visually recover from a commit-in-error.
frontmatter.author: pauleveritt
